usage.cn: 把握身边的幸福吧，不要让它擦肩而过。
usage.eng: Grasp the happiness around it, don't let it slip away.

usage.cn: 如果有一天，你累了，你疲倦了，只要你一回头，我的笑容就在你面前。
usage.eng: If you get tired one day,you will see my smile as long as you turn around.

usage.cn: 如果一个女人真的爱你，她会因为很多事情对你发脾气，却始终坚守在你身边
usage.eng: A woman who truly loves you will be angry at you for many things, but will stick around.

usage.cn: 有时候，转身离开要好过假装若无其事的坚持。
usage.eng: Sometimes, it is better to turn around and leave than to insist on and pretend to be well.
